   218‚Üístruct GridOverlay: View {
   219‚Üí    var body: some View {
   220‚Üí        GeometryReader { geometry in
   221‚Üí            let width = geometry.size.width
   222‚Üí            let height = geometry.size.height
   223‚Üí            
   224‚Üí            Path { path in
   225‚Üí                // ÂûÇÁõ¥Á∫ø - ‰∏âÂàÜ‰πã‰∏ÄÂ§Ñ
   226‚Üí                let oneThirdWidth = width / 3
   227‚Üí                let twoThirdWidth = width * 2 / 3
   228‚Üí                
   229‚Üí                path.move(to: CGPoint(x: oneThirdWidth, y: 0))
   230‚Üí                path.addLine(to: CGPoint(x: oneThirdWidth, y: height))
   231‚Üí                
   232‚Üí                path.move(to: CGPoint(x: twoThirdWidth, y: 0))
   233‚Üí                path.addLine(to: CGPoint(x: twoThirdWidth, y: height))
   234‚Üí                
   235‚Üí                // Ê∞¥Âπ≥Á∫ø - ‰∏âÂàÜ‰πã‰∏ÄÂ§Ñ
   236‚Üí                let oneThirdHeight = height / 3
   237‚Üí                let twoThirdHeight = height * 2 / 3
   238‚Üí                
   239‚Üí                path.move(to: CGPoint(x: 0, y: oneThirdHeight))
   240‚Üí                path.addLine(to: CGPoint(x: width, y: oneThirdHeight))
   241‚Üí                
   242‚Üí                path.move(to: CGPoint(x: 0, y: twoThirdHeight))
   243‚Üí                path.addLine(to: CGPoint(x: width, y: twoThirdHeight))
   244‚Üí            }
   245‚Üí            .stroke(Color.white.opacity(0.6), lineWidth: 1)
   246‚Üí        }
   247‚Üí        .allowsHitTesting(false)
   248‚Üí    }

    41‚Üí            // ‰ΩøÁî®ÈªòËÆ§ÂêéÁΩÆÁõ∏Êú∫ËøõË°åÂø´ÈÄüËÆæÁΩÆ
    42‚Üí            guard let defaultCamera = AVCaptureDevice.default(.builtInWideAngleCamera, for: .video, position: .back) else {
    43‚Üí                print("‚ùå Êó†Ê≥ïËé∑ÂèñÈªòËÆ§Áõ∏Êú∫")
    44‚Üí                return
    45‚Üí            }
    46‚Üí            
    47‚Üí            self.session.beginConfiguration()
    48‚Üí            
    49‚Üí            // ËÆæÁΩÆsession preset
    50‚Üí            if self.session.canSetSessionPreset(.photo) {
    51‚Üí                self.session.sessionPreset = .photo
    52‚Üí            }
    53‚Üí            
    54‚Üí            // ÈÖçÁΩÆÈªòËÆ§Áõ∏Êú∫
    55‚Üí            do {
    56‚Üí                let input = try AVCaptureDeviceInput(device: defaultCamera)
    57‚Üí                if self.session.canAddInput(input) {
    58‚Üí                    self.session.addInput(input)
    59‚Üí                    self.currentInput = input
    60‚Üí                    self.currentDevice = defaultCamera
    61‚Üí                }
    62‚Üí            } catch {
    63‚Üí                print("‚ùå ÈÖçÁΩÆÈªòËÆ§Áõ∏Êú∫Â§±Ë¥•: \(error)")
    64‚Üí            }
    65‚Üí            
    66‚Üí            // Ê∑ªÂä†ËæìÂá∫
    67‚Üí            self.session.addOutput(self.photoOutput)
    68‚Üí            
    69‚Üí            self.session.commitConfiguration()
    70‚Üí            
    71‚Üí            // Êõ¥Êñ∞Áõ∏Êú∫ÂàóË°®ÔºàÂú®‰∏ªÁ∫øÁ®ãÔºâ
    72‚Üí            DispatchQueue.main.async {
    73‚Üí                self.availableCameras = [defaultCamera]
    74‚Üí                print("‚úÖ Âø´ÈÄüËÆæÁΩÆÂÆåÊàêÔºåÁõ∏Êú∫ÂèØÁî®")
    75‚Üí            }
    76‚Üí            
    77‚Üí            // ÂèëÁé∞ÂÖ∂‰ªñÁõ∏Êú∫
    78‚Üí            self.discoverAdditionalCameras()
    79‚Üí        }
    80‚Üí    }
    81‚Üí    
    82‚Üí    private func setupSession() {
    83‚Üí        // Â∑≤ÁªèÂú® sessionQueue ‰∏≠Ë∞ÉÁî®Ôºå‰∏çÈúÄË¶ÅÂÜçÊ¨°ÂºÇÊ≠•
    84‚Üí        session.beginConfiguration()
    85‚Üí        
    86‚Üí        if session.canSetSessionPreset(.photo) {
    87‚Üí            session.sessionPreset = .photo
    88‚Üí        }
    89‚Üí        
    90‚Üí        session.addOutput(photoOutput)
    91‚Üí        
    92‚Üí        session.commitConfiguration()
    93‚Üí    }
    94‚Üí    
    95‚Üí    private func discoverAdditionalCameras() {
    96‚Üí        // ÂèëÁé∞ÂÖ∂‰ªñÂèØÁî®Áõ∏Êú∫ÔºàË∂ÖÂπøËßí„ÄÅÈïøÁÑ¶Á≠âÔºâ
    97‚Üí        let deviceTypes: [AVCaptureDevice.DeviceType] = [
    98‚Üí            .builtInUltraWideCamera,
    99‚Üí            .builtInWideAngleCamera,
   100‚Üí            .builtInTelephotoCamera,
   101‚Üí            .builtInTripleCamera,
   102‚Üí            .builtInDualCamera,
   103‚Üí            .builtInDualWideCamera
   104‚Üí        ]
   105‚Üí        
   106‚Üí        let discoverySession = AVCaptureDevice.DiscoverySession(
   107‚Üí            deviceTypes: deviceTypes,
   108‚Üí            mediaType: .video,
   109‚Üí            position: .back
   110‚Üí        )
   111‚Üí        
   112‚Üí        let allDevices = discoverySession.devices
   113‚Üí        var newCameras: [AVCaptureDevice] = []
   114‚Üí        
   115‚Üí        // Êåâ‰ºòÂÖàÁ∫ßÈ°∫Â∫èÊ∑ªÂä†Áõ∏Êú∫
   116‚Üí        if let ultraWide = allDevices.first(where: { $0.deviceType == .builtInUltraWideCamera }) {
   117‚Üí            newCameras.append(ultraWide)
   118‚Üí        }
   119‚Üí        
   120‚Üí        if let wide = allDevices.first(where: { $0.deviceType == .builtInWideAngleCamera }) {
   121‚Üí            newCameras.append(wide)
   122‚Üí        } else if let triple = allDevices.first(where: { $0.deviceType == .builtInTripleCamera }) {
   123‚Üí            newCameras.append(triple)
   124‚Üí        } else if let dual = allDevices.first(where: { $0.deviceType == .builtInDualCamera }) {
   125‚Üí            newCameras.append(dual)
   126‚Üí        } else if let dualWide = allDevices.first(where: { $0.deviceType == .builtInDualWideCamera }) {
   127‚Üí            newCameras.append(dualWide)
   128‚Üí        }
   129‚Üí        
   130‚Üí        if let telephoto = allDevices.first(where: { $0.deviceType == .builtInTelephotoCamera }) {
   131‚Üí            newCameras.append(telephoto)
   132‚Üí        }
   133‚Üí        
   134‚Üí        // Êõ¥Êñ∞Áõ∏Êú∫ÂàóË°®
   135‚Üí        DispatchQueue.main.async { [weak self] in
   136‚Üí            self?.availableCameras = newCameras.isEmpty ? (self?.availableCameras ?? []) : newCameras
   137‚Üí            print("ÂèëÁé∞ÁöÑÁõ∏Êú∫Êï∞Èáè: \(self?.availableCameras.count ?? 0)")
   138‚Üí        }
   139‚Üí    }
   140‚Üí    
   141‚Üí    private func discoverCameras() {
   142‚Üí        // Â∞ùËØïÂèëÁé∞ÊâÄÊúâÂèØËÉΩÁöÑÂêéÁΩÆÊëÑÂÉèÂ§¥
   143‚Üí        let deviceTypes: [AVCaptureDevice.DeviceType] = [
   144‚Üí            .builtInUltraWideCamera,
   145‚Üí            .builtInWideAngleCamera,
   146‚Üí            .builtInTelephotoCamera,
   147‚Üí            .builtInTripleCamera,
   148‚Üí            .builtInDualCamera,
   149‚Üí            .builtInDualWideCamera
   150‚Üí        ]
   151‚Üí        
   152‚Üí        let discoverySession = AVCaptureDevice.DiscoverySession(
   153‚Üí            deviceTypes: deviceTypes,
   154‚Üí            mediaType: .video,
   155‚Üí            position: .back
   156‚Üí        )
   157‚Üí        
   158‚Üí        // Ëé∑ÂèñÊâÄÊúâÂèëÁé∞ÁöÑËÆæÂ§á
   159‚Üí        let allDevices = discoverySession.devices
   160‚Üí        
   161‚Üí        // Êåâ‰ºòÂÖàÁ∫ßÈ°∫Â∫èÊ∑ªÂä†Áõ∏Êú∫
   162‚Üí        availableCameras = []
   163‚Üí        
   164‚Üí        // Ê∑ªÂä†Ë∂ÖÂπøËßí
   165‚Üí        if let ultraWide = allDevices.first(where: { $0.deviceType == .builtInUltraWideCamera }) {
   166‚Üí            availableCameras.append(ultraWide)
   167‚Üí        }
   168‚Üí        
   169‚Üí        // Ê∑ªÂä†‰∏ªÊëÑÂÉèÂ§¥ÔºàÂπøËßíÔºâ
   170‚Üí        if let wide = allDevices.first(where: { $0.deviceType == .builtInWideAngleCamera }) {
   171‚Üí            availableCameras.append(wide)
   172‚Üí        } else if let triple = allDevices.first(where: { $0.deviceType == .builtInTripleCamera }) {
   173‚Üí            availableCameras.append(triple)
   174‚Üí        } else if let dual = allDevices.first(where: { $0.deviceType == .builtInDualCamera }) {
   175‚Üí            availableCameras.append(dual)
   176‚Üí        } else if let dualWide = allDevices.first(where: { $0.deviceType == .builtInDualWideCamera }) {
   177‚Üí            availableCameras.append(dualWide)
   178‚Üí        }
   179‚Üí        
   180‚Üí        // Ê∑ªÂä†ÈïøÁÑ¶
   181‚Üí        if let telephoto = allDevices.first(where: { $0.deviceType == .builtInTelephotoCamera }) {
   182‚Üí            availableCameras.append(telephoto)
   183‚Üí        }
   184‚Üí        
   185‚Üí        // Â¶ÇÊûúÊ≤°ÊâæÂà∞‰ªª‰ΩïÊåáÂÆöÁ±ªÂûãÁöÑÁõ∏Êú∫Ôºå‰ΩøÁî®ÈªòËÆ§ÁöÑÂêéÁΩÆÁõ∏Êú∫
   186‚Üí        if availableCameras.isEmpty {
   187‚Üí            if let defaultCamera = AVCaptureDevice.default(.builtInWideAngleCamera, for: .video, position: .back) {
   188‚Üí                availableCameras.append(defaultCamera)
   189‚Üí            }
   190‚Üí        }
   191‚Üí        
   192‚Üí        print("ÂèëÁé∞ÁöÑÁõ∏Êú∫Êï∞Èáè: \(availableCameras.count)")
   193‚Üí        for (index, camera) in availableCameras.enumerated() {
   194‚Üí            print("Áõ∏Êú∫ \(index): \(camera.deviceType.rawValue)")
   195‚Üí        }
   196‚Üí        
   197‚Üí        // ÈÖçÁΩÆÈªòËÆ§Áõ∏Êú∫
   198‚Üí        if let defaultCamera = availableCameras.first {
   199‚Üí            configureCamera(defaultCamera)
   200‚Üí        }
   201‚Üí    }
   202‚Üí    
   203‚Üí    private func configureCamera(_ device: AVCaptureDevice) {
   204‚Üí        sessionQueue.async { [weak self] in
   205‚Üí            guard let self = self else { return }
   206‚Üí            
   207‚Üí            self.session.beginConfiguration()
   208‚Üí            
   209‚Üí            if let currentInput = self.currentInput {
   210‚Üí                self.session.removeInput(currentInput)
   211‚Üí            }
   212‚Üí            
   213‚Üí            do {
   214‚Üí                let input = try AVCaptureDeviceInput(device: device)
   215‚Üí                if self.session.canAddInput(input) {
   216‚Üí                    self.session.addInput(input)
   217‚Üí                    self.currentInput = input
   218‚Üí                    self.currentDevice = device
   219‚Üí                }
   220‚Üí            } catch {
   221‚Üí                print("Error configuring camera: \(error)")
   222‚Üí            }
   223‚Üí            
   224‚Üí            self.session.commitConfiguration()
   225‚Üí        }
   226‚Üí    }
   227‚Üí    
   228‚Üí    func requestPermissions(completion: @escaping (Bool) -> Void) {
   229‚Üí        let cameraAuthStatus = AVCaptureDevice.authorizationStatus(for: .video)
   230‚Üí        
   231‚Üí        switch cameraAuthStatus {
   232‚Üí        case .authorized:
   233‚Üí            completion(true)
   234‚Üí        case .notDetermined:
   235‚Üí            AVCaptureDevice.requestAccess(for: .video) { granted in
   236‚Üí                DispatchQueue.main.async {
   237‚Üí                    completion(granted)
   238‚Üí                }
   239‚Üí            }
   240‚Üí        default:
   241‚Üí            completion(false)
   242‚Üí        }
   243‚Üí    }
   244‚Üí    
   245‚Üí    func startSession() {
   246‚Üí        sessionQueue.async { [weak self] in
   247‚Üí            guard let self = self, !self.session.isRunning else { return }
   248‚Üí            self.session.startRunning()
   249‚Üí        }
   250‚Üí    }
   251‚Üí    
   252‚Üí    func stopSession() {
   253‚Üí        sessionQueue.async { [weak self] in
   254‚Üí            guard let self = self, self.session.isRunning else { return }
   255‚Üí            self.session.stopRunning()
   256‚Üí        }
   257‚Üí    }
   258‚Üí    
   259‚Üí    func switchCamera(to index: Int) {
   260‚Üí        guard index >= 0 && index < availableCameras.count else { return }
   261‚Üí        
   262‚Üí        let selectedCamera = availableCameras[index]
   263‚Üí        currentCameraIndex = index
   264‚Üí        configureCamera(selectedCamera)
   265‚Üí    }
   266‚Üí    
   267‚Üí    func capturePhoto(completion: @escaping (Result<Data, Error>) -> Void) {
   268‚Üí        sessionQueue.async { [weak self] in
   269‚Üí            guard let self = self else { return }
   270‚Üí            
   271‚Üí            // Ê£ÄÊü• session ÊòØÂê¶Âú®ËøêË°å
   272‚Üí            guard self.session.isRunning else {
   273‚Üí                DispatchQueue.main.async {
   274‚Üí                    completion(.failure(NSError(domain: "CameraService", code: -1, userInfo: [NSLocalizedDescriptionKey: "Áõ∏Êú∫Êú™ÂêØÂä®"])))
   275‚Üí                }
   276‚Üí                return
   277‚Üí            }
   278‚Üí            
   279‚Üí            let settings = AVCapturePhotoSettings()
   280‚Üí            
   281‚Üí            // ËÆæÁΩÆÈó™ÂÖâÁÅØÊ®°Âºè
   282‚Üí            if let currentDevice = self.currentDevice, currentDevice.hasFlash {
   283‚Üí                settings.flashMode = .auto
   284‚Üí            } else {
   285‚Üí                settings.flashMode = .off
   286‚Üí            }
   287‚Üí            
   288‚Üí            // ÂÆâÂÖ®ËÆæÁΩÆÁÖßÁâáË¥®Èáè‰ºòÂÖàÁ∫ß
   289‚Üí            let maxQuality = self.photoOutput.maxPhotoQualityPrioritization
   290‚Üí            if maxQuality.rawValue >= AVCapturePhotoOutput.QualityPrioritization.quality.rawValue {
   291‚Üí                settings.photoQualityPrioritization = .quality
   292‚Üí            } else if maxQuality.rawValue >= AVCapturePhotoOutput.QualityPrioritization.balanced.rawValue {
   293‚Üí                settings.photoQualityPrioritization = .balanced
   294‚Üí            } else {
   295‚Üí                settings.photoQualityPrioritization = .speed
   296‚Üí            }
   297‚Üí            
   298‚Üí            print("ÊãçÁÖßËÆæÁΩÆ - Ë¥®Èáè‰ºòÂÖàÁ∫ß: \(settings.photoQualityPrioritization.rawValue), ËÆæÂ§áÊúÄÂ§ßÊîØÊåÅ: \(maxQuality.rawValue)")
   299‚Üí            
   300‚Üí            self.photoCompletionHandler = completion
   301‚Üí            self.photoOutput.capturePhoto(with: settings, delegate: self)
   302‚Üí        }
   303‚Üí    }
   304‚Üí    
   305‚Üí    func setFocusPoint(_ point: CGPoint) {
   306‚Üí        guard let device = currentDevice, device.isFocusPointOfInterestSupported else { return }
   307‚Üí        
   308‚Üí        do {
   309‚Üí            try device.lockForConfiguration()
   310‚Üí            device.focusPointOfInterest = point
   311‚Üí            device.focusMode = .autoFocus
   312‚Üí            
   313‚Üí            if device.isExposurePointOfInterestSupported {
   314‚Üí                device.exposurePointOfInterest = point
   315‚Üí                device.exposureMode = .autoExpose
   316‚Üí            }
   317‚Üí            
   318‚Üí            device.unlockForConfiguration()
   319‚Üí        } catch {
   320‚Üí            print("Error setting focus point: \(error)")
   321‚Üí        }
   322‚Üí    }
   323‚Üí    
   324‚Üí    func setExposureCompensation(_ value: Float) {
   325‚Üí        guard let device = currentDevice else { return }
   326‚Üí        
   327‚Üí        do {
   328‚Üí            try device.lockForConfiguration()
   329‚Üí            device.setExposureTargetBias(value, completionHandler: nil)
   330‚Üí            device.unlockForConfiguration()
   331‚Üí        } catch {
   332‚Üí            print("Error setting exposure compensation: \(error)")
   333‚Üí        }
   334‚Üí    }
   335‚Üí    
   336‚Üí    private func savePhotoToLibrary(_ imageData: Data) {
   337‚Üí        PHPhotoLibrary.requestAuthorization { [weak self] status in
   338‚Üí            if status == .authorized {
   339‚Üí                PHPhotoLibrary.shared().performChanges({
   340‚Üí                    let request = PHAssetCreationRequest.forAsset()
   341‚Üí                    
   342‚Üí                    // ÂàõÂª∫ËµÑÊ∫êÈÄâÈ°π‰ª•‰øùÁïô EXIF ‰ø°ÊÅØ
   343‚Üí                    let options = PHAssetResourceCreationOptions()
   344‚Üí                    options.shouldMoveFile = false
   345‚Üí                    
   346‚Üí                    // Ê∑ªÂä†Â¢ûÂº∫ÁöÑÂÖÉÊï∞ÊçÆ
   347‚Üí                    if let enhancedImageData = self?.addCameraMetadata(to: imageData) {
   348‚Üí                        request.addResource(with: .photo, data: enhancedImageData, options: options)
   349‚Üí                    } else {
   350‚Üí                        request.addResource(with: .photo, data: imageData, options: options)
   351‚Üí                    }
   352‚Üí                }) { success, error in
   353‚Üí                    if let error = error {
   354‚Üí                        print("Error saving photo: \(error)")
   355‚Üí                    } else {
   356‚Üí                        print("ÁÖßÁâáÂ∑≤ÊàêÂäü‰øùÂ≠òÂà∞Áõ∏ÂÜåÔºåÂåÖÂê´Áõ∏Êú∫‰ø°ÊÅØ")
   357‚Üí                    }
   358‚Üí                }
   359‚Üí            }
   360‚Üí        }
   361‚Üí    }
   362‚Üí    
   363‚Üí    private func addCameraMetadata(to imageData: Data) -> Data? {
   364‚Üí        guard let source = CGImageSourceCreateWithData(imageData as CFData, nil),
   365‚Üí              let imageProperties = CGImageSourceCopyPropertiesAtIndex(source, 0, nil) as? [String: Any] else {
   366‚Üí            return nil
   367‚Üí        }
   368‚Üí        
   369‚Üí        var mutableProperties = imageProperties
   370‚Üí        
   371‚Üí        // Ê∑ªÂä† EXIF ‰ø°ÊÅØ
   372‚Üí        var exifDict = mutableProperties[kCGImagePropertyExifDictionary as String] as? [String: Any] ?? [:]
   373‚Üí        
   374‚Üí        // Áõ∏Êú∫Âà∂ÈÄ†ÂïÜÂíåÂûãÂè∑
   375‚Üí        exifDict[kCGImagePropertyExifLensMake as String] = "Apple"
   376‚Üí        exifDict[kCGImagePropertyExifLensModel as String] = getCurrentCameraModel()
   377‚Üí        
   378‚Üí        // ÁÑ¶Ë∑ù‰ø°ÊÅØ
   379‚Üí        if let device = currentDevice {
   380‚Üí            exifDict[kCGImagePropertyExifFocalLength as String] = device.activeFormat.videoMaxZoomFactor
   381‚Üí            exifDict[kCGImagePropertyExifFocalLenIn35mmFilm as String] = getFocalLengthEquivalent()
   382‚Üí        }
   383‚Üí        
   384‚Üí        // Â∫îÁî®‰ø°ÊÅØ
   385‚Üí        exifDict[kCGImagePropertyExifUserComment as String] = "MCCamera App"
   386‚Üí        
   387‚Üí        mutableProperties[kCGImagePropertyExifDictionary as String] = exifDict
   388‚Üí        
   389‚Üí        // Ê∑ªÂä† TIFF ‰ø°ÊÅØ
   390‚Üí        var tiffDict = mutableProperties[kCGImagePropertyTIFFDictionary as String] as? [String: Any] ?? [:]
   391‚Üí        tiffDict[kCGImagePropertyTIFFMake as String] = "Apple"
   392‚Üí        tiffDict[kCGImagePropertyTIFFModel as String] = UIDevice.current.model
   393‚Üí        tiffDict[kCGImagePropertyTIFFSoftware as String] = "MCCamera 1.0"
   394‚Üí        
   395‚Üí        mutableProperties[kCGImagePropertyTIFFDictionary as String] = tiffDict
   396‚Üí        
   397‚Üí        // ÂàõÂª∫Êñ∞ÁöÑÂõæÁâáÊï∞ÊçÆ
   398‚Üí        guard let mutableData = CFDataCreateMutable(nil, 0),
   399‚Üí              let destination = CGImageDestinationCreateWithData(mutableData, kUTTypeJPEG, 1, nil) else {
   400‚Üí            return nil
   401‚Üí        }
   402‚Üí        
   403‚Üí        if let cgImage = CGImageSourceCreateImageAtIndex(source, 0, nil) {
   404‚Üí            CGImageDestinationAddImage(destination, cgImage, mutableProperties as CFDictionary)
   405‚Üí            CGImageDestinationFinalize(destination)
   406‚Üí            return mutableData as Data
   407‚Üí        }
   408‚Üí        
   409‚Üí        return nil
   410‚Üí    }
   411‚Üí    
   412‚Üí    private func getCurrentCameraModel() -> String {
   413‚Üí        guard let device = currentDevice else { return "Unknown" }
   414‚Üí        
   415‚Üí        switch device.deviceType {
   416‚Üí        case .builtInUltraWideCamera:
   417‚Üí            return "Ultra Wide Camera"
   418‚Üí        case .builtInWideAngleCamera:
   419‚Üí            return "Wide Camera"
   420‚Üí        case .builtInTelephotoCamera:
   421‚Üí            return "Telephoto Camera"
   422‚Üí        case .builtInTripleCamera:
   423‚Üí            return "Triple Camera"
   424‚Üí        case .builtInDualCamera:
   425‚Üí            return "Dual Camera"
   426‚Üí        case .builtInDualWideCamera:
   427‚Üí            return "Dual Wide Camera"
   428‚Üí        default:
   429‚Üí            return "iPhone Camera"
   430‚Üí        }
   431‚Üí    }
   432‚Üí    
   433‚Üí    private func getFocalLengthEquivalent() -> Int {
   434‚Üí        guard let device = currentDevice else { return 28 }
   435‚Üí        
   436‚Üí        switch device.deviceType {
   437‚Üí        case .builtInUltraWideCamera:

   434‚Üí                apertureValue = 2.8
   435‚Üí            default:
   436‚Üí                apertureValue = 1.8
   437‚Üí            }
   438‚Üí            exifDict[kCGImagePropertyExifFNumber as String] = apertureValue
   439‚Üí            print("üìä ËÆæÁΩÆÂÖâÂúà: f/\(apertureValue)")
   440‚Üí        }
   441‚Üí        
   442‚Üí        // ËÆæÁΩÆÂÖ∂‰ªñÊ†áÂáÜEXIFÂÄº

   444‚Üí        exifDict[kCGImagePropertyExifExposureMode as String] = 0 // Ëá™Âä®ÊõùÂÖâ

   448‚Üí

   450‚Üí

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Tool use: **WebFetch**

Result:

```
Based on the article, here are key insights for handling photo orientation and metadata in iOS:

1. Video/Photo Orientation Handling:
The article explains that iOS handles orientation through `AVCaptureVideoOrientation`, which has four primary states:
- `AVCaptureVideoOrientationPortrait` (home button down)
- `AVCaptureVideoOrientationPortraitUpsideDown` (home button up)
- `AVCaptureVideoOrientationLandscapeRight` (home button right)
- `AVCaptureVideoOrientationLandscapeLeft` (home button left)

2. Metadata Correction Strategies:
- Specify video orientation before capturing to ensure correct display
- Use `connection.videoOrientation` to set input orientation
- Manually transform video orientation if you want a specific viewing angle

3. Key Code Example:
\```objc
AVCaptureConnection *connection = [_imageOutput connectionWithMediaType:AVMediaTypeVideo];
if (connection.isVideoOrientationSupported) {
    connection.videoOrientation = [self currentVideoOrientation];
}
\```

The goal is to ensure photos and videos display correctly when saved to the Photos app, matching the user's actual device orientation during capture.
```

import Photos

// ÂÅáËÆæ‰Ω†ÁöÑ CameraService ÈÅµÂæ™‰∫Ü AVCapturePhotoCaptureDelegate
class CameraService: NSObject, AVCapturePhotoCaptureDelegate {
    
    // ... ÂÖ∂‰ªñ AVCaptureSession, device, output Á≠âËÆæÁΩÆ ...
    
    private let photoOutput = AVCapturePhotoOutput()
    
    // ÂΩìÊãçÁÖßÊó∂Ë∞ÉÁî®Ëøô‰∏™ÊñπÊ≥ï
    func capturePhoto() {
        // Âú®ËøôÈáåÈÖçÁΩÆ‰Ω†ÁöÑÁÖßÁâáËÆæÁΩÆÔºåÊØîÂ¶ÇÊ†ºÂºè
        let settings = AVCapturePhotoSettings()
        // ÊØîÂ¶ÇÊàë‰ª¨ÊÉ≥Ë¶Å HEIC Ê†ºÂºè
        if photoOutput.availablePhotoCodecTypes.contains(.hevc) {
            settings = AVCapturePhotoSettings(format: [AVVideoCodecKey: AVVideoCodecType.hevc])
        }
        
        photoOutput.capturePhoto(with: settings, delegate: self)
    }
    
    // ËøôÊòØÂÖ≥ÈîÆÁöÑÂõûË∞ÉÊñπÊ≥ï
    func photoOutput(_ output: AVCapturePhotoOutput, didFinishProcessingPhoto photo: AVCapturePhoto, error: Error?) {
        if let error = error {
            print("Error capturing photo: \(error)")
            return
        }
        
        // ÂÖ≥ÈîÆÊ≠•È™§Ôºö‰ΩøÁî® fileDataRepresentation() Ëé∑ÂèñÂåÖÂê´ÂÖÉÊï∞ÊçÆÁöÑÂÆåÊï¥Êï∞ÊçÆ
        guard let imageData = photo.fileDataRepresentation() else {
            print("Could not get file data representation.")
            return
        }
        
        // Áé∞Âú®Ôºå‰ΩøÁî® Photos Ê°ÜÊû∂‰øùÂ≠òËøô‰∏™ÂÆåÊï¥ÁöÑ imageData
        PHPhotoLibrary.shared().performChanges({
            let creationRequest = PHAssetCreationRequest.forAsset()
            // Áõ¥Êé•Â∞ÜÂåÖÂê´ÂÖÉÊï∞ÊçÆÁöÑ imageData Ê∑ªÂä†‰∏∫ËµÑÊ∫ê
            creationRequest.addResource(with: .photo, data: imageData, options: nil)
            
            // Â¶ÇÊûú‰Ω†ÊÉ≥ÊâãÂä®Ê∑ªÂä†‰ΩçÁΩÆ‰ø°ÊÅØÔºàËßÅ‰∏ãÊñπËØ¥ÊòéÔºâ
            // creationRequest.location = self.currentLocation 
            
        }) { success, error in
            if let error = error {
                print("Error saving photo to library: \(error)")
            } else if success {
                print("Successfully saved photo to library.")
                // Âú®ËøôÈáå‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•ÈÄöËøáÈó≠ÂåÖÊàñ‰ª£ÁêÜÈÄöÁü•‰Ω†ÁöÑ ViewModel Êõ¥Êñ∞ UIÔºàÊØîÂ¶ÇÊòæÁ§∫Áº©Áï•ÂõæÔºâ
            }
        }
    }
}
